node.statement: We prove that each h_i permutes the blocks of B_0 = {{1,4}, {2,5}, {3,6}} by direct computation. The proof splits into three parts: (1) showing h_1 permutes B_0, (2) showing h_2 permutes B_0, and (3) showing h_3 permutes B_0. Each part requires computing the image of each block under the respective cycle.
